sentence.Network_en: Death however it comes, is a mystery before which one cannot stand unmoved and unregretful.
sentence.Network_cn: 死亡,无论怎样到来, 毕竞是神秘的.人面对死亡终不能无动于衷,毫不痛惜.

list.abs: was completely unregretful about what had happened., 对所发生的事情完全不感到后悔.

sentences.sentence: "was completely unregretful about what had happened"

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
